TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurface extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurface Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurface : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurface = class interface IDisposable interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: Presents a user interface for designing components.

span.span: Presents a user interface for designing components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作使用者感知為設計工具。The class implements what the user perceives as a designer. 為使用者介面使用者操作來變更設計階段功能。 is the user interface the user manipulates to change design-time features. 提供的完全獨立的設計介面。 provides a completely self-contained design surface. 類別可做為獨立的設計工具中，或它可能會令人敬謝類別，以提供裝載多個應用程式的通用實作物件。The class may be used as a stand-alone designer, or it may be coupled with the class to provide a common implementation for an application that hosts multiple objects. 類別可由本身，或使用者可以從中衍生新類別，將它擴大的行為。The class can be used by itself, or the user can derive a new class from it and augment the behavior. 類別會自動提供數個設計階段服務。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 類別會加入其所有的服務在其建構函式。The class adds all of its services in its constructor. 大部分的服務可覆寫並取代在受保護屬性。Most of these services can be overridden by replacing them in the protected property. 若要取代的服務，覆寫建構函式，呼叫基底，並進行任何變更透過受保護屬性。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 所有服務，會加入至服務容器，以及實作設計介面中遭處置時進行處置。All services that are added to the service container and that implement are disposed when the design surface is disposed. 一組預設的可取代服務類別會提供下表所示。The default set of replaceable services that the class provides is shown in the following table. |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可讓不屬於容器的元件集合，提供它們自己的擴充性提供者的物件。Enables objects that are not part of the container’s components collection to provide their own extender providers.| ||使用以取得擴充性提供者的清單。Used by to get a list of extender providers. 與此服務，可以即時容器之外的擴充性提供者。With this service, extender providers can live outside of the container.| ||提供設計工具中繼資料攔截程序。Provides designer metadata hooks. 這是中繼資料篩選的主要介面。This is the primary interface for metadata filtering.| ||可用來在設計工具中選取的元件。Provides a way to select components in the designer.| ||提供方法，以取得物件的名稱，即使這些物件未設置。Provides a way to get a name for objects, even when those objects are not sited.| ||提供設計介面做為服務。Offers the design surface itself as a service.| ||提供基底類別取得和設定選項值，設計工具。Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.| 下表顯示非可取代預設提供的服務。The following table shows the non-replaceable services provided by default. |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||會對元件的變更會引發事件。Raises events as changes are made to components.| ||控制存取類型、 服務和交易。Controls access to types, services, and transactions. 設計工具的主要介面。Master interface for designers.| ||擁有正在設計的元件組。Owns the set of components that are being designed. 每個設計工具有擁有的元件。Each designer has an that owns the components.| ||衍生自並可提供方法來加入和移除服務，從設計工具。Derives from and provides a way to add and remove services from the designer.| 這些服務，除了類別也提供可透過元件的站台的單一服務。In addition to these services, the class also provides a single service that is available through a component’s site. 此服務是唯一的每個元件。This service is unique for each component. 下表會顯示無法取代的服務。The following table shows the services that cannot be replaced. |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可以用來儲存有關元件的任意資料的索引鍵/值組的泛型字典。A generic dictionary of key/value pairs that can be used to store arbitrary data about a component.| ||容器可讓元件至設計工具中新增其他子元件。A container that enables a component to add additional child components to the designer. 這些元件將是設計介面的一部分，但不是會參與序列化。These components will be part of the design surface, but will not participate in serialization. 當您想要設計的控制項時還能夠公開本身的區域在設計工具中，這非常有用，但是您不想要參與序列化的區域。This is useful when you want to design a control that is capable of exposing a region of itself in a designer, but you do not want the region to participate in serialization.| 除了，站台也會實作下列介面。In addition to , the site also implements the following interfaces. > [!CAUTION] > 檢查存在這些介面，而非使用任意轉型，因為其他站台的實作可能無法實作它們。Check for the existence of these interfaces, rather than use indiscriminate casting, because other site implementations may not implement them. |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可用來取得特定站台服務的容器。Provides a way to get to the container of site-specific services. 例如，是站台特有的服務。For example, is a site-specific service. 與此服務，您可以新增其他站台特有的服務。With this service, you can add additional site-specific services.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用建構函式，它會建立簡單的設計工具載入器，亦會建立指定類型的元件，並於結束載入程序。When you use the constructor, it creates a simple designer loader that, in turn, creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 這是直接的方法建立設計工具中的，假設所有儲存的狀態會在外部完成。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 就內部而言，這會呼叫和傳遞根元件類型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type. > [!NOTE] > 多載不會受到。The overload is not affected by . 載入設計介面之前，必須是服務容器中。The must be in the service container before the design surface loads. 如果您需要存取、 呼叫空的建構函式、 新增至呼叫與`rootComponentType`。If you need access to , call the empty constructor, add the to the and call with `rootComponentType`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式建立簡單的設計工具載入器會建立指定類型的元件，然後結束 載入程序。Using the constructor creates a simple designer loader that creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 這是直接的方法建立設計工具中的，假設所有儲存的狀態會在外部完成。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 就內部而言，這會呼叫和傳遞根元件類型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因此載入可能會繼續進行這個呼叫傳回之後，可以是非同步，設計工具載入。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加事件處理常式設計介面已完成載入時收到通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 之後是呼叫，您可以立即取得檢視的設計工具中，因為設計工具載入器必須提供至少根元件以非同步方式載入時。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.

summary.span: Begins the loading process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`rootComponentType`指定，則預設設計工具載入器，只需要建立的執行個體`rootComponentType`將使用。When `rootComponentType` is specified, a default designer loader that simply creates an instance of `rootComponentType` will be used. 因此載入可能會繼續進行這個呼叫傳回之後，可以是非同步，設計工具載入。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加事件處理常式設計介面已完成載入時收到通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 之後是呼叫，您可以立即取得檢視的設計工具中，因為設計工具載入器必須提供至少根元件以非同步方式載入時。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously. > [!NOTE] > 方法會建立元件類型的執行個體，並初始化這個執行個體的設計工具。The method creates an instance of the component type and initializes a designer for this instance. 此方法傳回之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before this method returns.

returns.span: An instance of the requested designer, or if no matching designer could be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由設計介面的呼叫元件加入至容器中時。The method is called by the design surface’s when a component is added to the container. 這個方法會建立設計工具，但不會初始化。This method creates a designer, but does not initialize it. 當它傳回時，設計工具是由容器初始化。When it returns, the designer is initialized by the container. 可以建立兩個不同類型的設計工具： 根設計工具和一般設計工具。 can create two different types of designers: root designers and normal designers. 根目錄設計工具是在設計介面中，它的定義是新增至容器的第一個元件的根元件的設計工具。A root designer is a designer for the root component in the design surface, which by definition is the first component added to the container. 與一般設計工具的根目錄設計工具不同，因為他們負責顯示給使用者的使用者介面。Root designers differ from normal designers because they are responsible for the user interface presented to the end user. 根目錄設計工具通常會協調設計介面上設計工具，可提供此介面的其餘部分。Root designers typically coordinate with the rest of the designers on a design surface to provide this interface. 這個方法的預設實作會委派至，並傳入為根目錄設計工具，設計工具的型別或一般設計工具。The default implementation of this method delegates to , passing in as the designer type for root designers, or for normal designers. 您可以覆寫這個方法來要求特定類型的設計工具。You can override this method to request a specific type of designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元件加入巢狀容器會建立它的設計工具並使其適合所有服務可從設計介面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 加入巢狀容器的元件不會參與序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元件加入巢狀容器會建立它的設計工具並使其適合所有服務可從設計介面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 加入巢狀容器的元件不會參與序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization. 您可以提供其他名稱方法藉由傳遞值到`containerName`。You can provide an additional name for the method by passing a value into `containerName`.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases the resources used by the .

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公用方法會依循標準模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 呼叫這個方法會終結在設計介面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 這個方法的受保護的版本是`virtual`就會遵循一般模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因為並沒有任何原生程式碼以清除，它並沒有完成項呼叫。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要呼叫，您必須自己加入完成項。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the resources used by the .

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公用方法會依循標準模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 呼叫這個方法會終結在設計介面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 這個方法的受保護的版本是`virtual`就會遵循一般模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因為並沒有任何原生程式碼以清除，它並沒有完成項呼叫。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要呼叫，您必須自己加入完成項。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: Occurs when the design surface is disposed.

span.span: Occurs when the design surface is disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面已處置的時，才會公開方法呼叫。The surface is only disposed when the public method on is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: Serializes changes to the design surface.

span.span: Serializes changes to the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 推播至設計介面向序列化程式所做的變更，可以呼叫方法。The method can be called to push changes made to the design surface down to the serializer. 這可確保在設計介面和其序列化的狀態會同步處理。This ensures that the design surface and its serialized state are synchronized. 這個方法的實際實作轉寄到與設計介面關聯的設計工具載入器。The actual implementation of this method is forwarded to the designer loader associated with design surface. 設計工具載入器可能會選擇變更直到延後呼叫時，或它可能會選擇要保留的最新狀態的所有使用者變更序列化的資料。The designer loader may choose to defer changes until is called, or it may choose to keep the serialized data up to date with all user changes. 方法可確保不論設計工具載入器選擇要使用的模式，同步序列化的狀態是與實際的設計介面。The method ensures that regardless of the model the designer loader chooses to use, the serialized state is synchronized with the actual design surface.

summary.span: Occurs when a call is made to the method of .

span.span: Occurs when a call is made to the method of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，排清設計工具載入器，然後就會引發事件。The designer loader is flushed first, and then the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取在設計介面的服務容器中的服務。The method retrieves a service in the design surface’s service container. 此外，這個方法會轉送至設計介面在建構階段指定任何服務提供者。In addition, this will forward to any service provider that was given to the design surface at construction time.

summary.span: Occurs when the designer load has completed.

span.span: Occurs when the designer load has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功載入，以及失敗的項目就會引發事件。The event is raised for successful loads as well as unsuccessful ones. 如果此事件處理常式中的程式碼擲回例外狀況，在設計工具將會卸載。If code in this event handler throws an exception, the designer is unloaded. 物件可用來判斷如果載入成功，而且同時可提供載入期間發生之錯誤的清單。The object can be used to determine if loading succeeded, and it can also provide a list of errors that occurred during the load. > [!NOTE] > 前提是序列化系統可以容忍錯誤，可能會成功的載入，發生錯誤。Errors can occur for successful loads as well, provided that the serialization system can tolerate errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceContainer As ServiceContainer

summary.span: Gets the service container.

span.span: Gets the service container.

value.span: 設計介面中所包含的設計工具會提供所有服務的服務容器。

span.span: The service container that provides all services to designers contained within the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建構階段將預設的服務加入到此服務容器。At construction time, adds default services into this service container. 預設服務處於目前狀態，或者您可以將它們移除並取代它們。You can leave the default services in their present state, or you can remove them and replace them with your own. 預設的服務是所有要求所建立，因此不會遺失任何在建構階段加入它們的效能。The default services are all demand-created, so there is no loss in performance for adding them at construction time.

span.span: The attached to the has been disposed.

summary.span: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.

span.span: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.

summary.span: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.

span.span: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設計工具卸載時，就會終結該設計工具的整個狀態，包括設計工具的檢視。When a designer unloads, the entire state for that designer is destroyed, including the designer’s view. 檢視應該會在這次沒有父代。The view should be unparented at this time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要支援方法，您的事件處理常式應該啟用這個設計介面的視窗。If you want to support the method, your event handler should activate the window for this design surface.
